criteria: Identification of Major Internal Body Parts
Explanation of Functions of Major Internal Body Parts
Identification of Major External Body Parts
Explanation of Functions of Major External Body Parts
descriptions: The student cannot identify any major internal body parts.
The student can identify 1-2 major internal body parts with significant inaccuracies.
The student can identify 3-4 major internal body parts with some inaccuracies.
The student can identify most major internal body parts with minor inaccuracies.
The student can accurately identify nearly all major internal body parts.
The student can accurately and comprehensively identify all major internal body parts.
The student cannot explain the function of any major internal body part.
The student attempts to explain the function of 1-2 major internal body parts, but the explanations are largely incorrect or incomplete.
The student can partially explain the function of 3-4 major internal body parts with significant gaps in understanding.
The student can explain the primary function of most major internal body parts with some minor inaccuracies or omissions.
The student can accurately explain the functions of nearly all major internal body parts.
The student provides accurate, comprehensive, and detailed explanations of the functions of all major internal body parts.
The student cannot identify any major external body parts.
The student can identify 1-2 major external body parts with significant inaccuracies.
The student can identify 3-4 major external body parts with some inaccuracies.
The student can identify most major external body parts with minor inaccuracies.
The student can accurately identify nearly all major external body parts.
The student can accurately and comprehensively identify all major external body parts.
The student cannot explain the function of any major external body part.
The student attempts to explain the function of 1-2 major external body parts, but the explanations are largely incorrect or incomplete.
The student can partially explain the function of 3-4 major external body parts with significant gaps in understanding.
The student can explain the primary function of most major external body parts with some minor inaccuracies or omissions.
The student can accurately explain the functions of nearly all major external body parts.
The student provides accurate, comprehensive, and detailed explanations of the functions of all major external body parts.
